summary: Frontend testing complete for Trading Bot integration into AI Command Center. All requested features verified working: AI Trading Assistant panel renders correctly with integrated bot controls, mode selector, chat commands, and Bot Trades section. TradingBotPanel is no longer rendered separately.
passed_tests: AI Trading Assistant panel renders with 'Scanner + AI + Bot integrated' subtitle
Bot status header shows STOPPED/RUNNING state correctly
Bot toggle button works - starts and stops the bot
Mode selector works - Confirmation/Auto/Paused buttons clickable and show active state
Chat input accepts text and sends messages
'show my trades' command works - displays Open Trades response
'stop the bot' command works - stops bot and shows confirmation message
'start the bot' command works - starts bot and shows confirmation message
Bot Trades section renders with Pending/Open/Closed tabs
Tab switching works in Bot Trades section
Quick action pills (My Trades, Performance, Market, Rules) are clickable
TradingBotPanel is NOT rendered separately (verified via DOM inspection)
No 'TradingBotPanel' string found in page HTML
Confirmation dialog component exists in code with proper data-testid
CoachingAlertMessage component has Execute/Half Size/Pass buttons with data-testid
Earnings and Watchlist sections render correctly
critical_code_review_comments: TradingBotPanel.jsx still exists in codebase but is correctly not imported in AICoachTab.jsx
TradingBotPanel is still exported from components/index.js - could be cleaned up if not used elsewhere
CoachingAlertMessage and ConfirmationDialog components properly integrated with data-testid attributes
Bot status polling interval is 10 seconds - appropriate for real-time updates
context_for_next_testing_agent: Trading Bot is now fully integrated into AICommandPanel. Key components: BotStatusHeader (toggle + mode selector), CoachingAlertMessage (for scanner alerts with Execute/Half Size/Pass buttons), ConfirmationDialog (appears before trade execution). Chat commands supported: 'show my trades', 'stop the bot', 'start the bot', 'take [SYMBOL]', 'pass on [SYMBOL]'. TradingBotPanel.jsx file still exists but is not imported anywhere - can be deleted if cleanup needed.

coaching_alerts.component: CoachingAlertMessage exists with Execute/Half Size/Pass buttons

confirmation_dialog.triggers_on: Execute button click from coaching alerts
